Package app.backend

Class Receipt

java.lang.Object
app.backend.Receipt
public class Receipt extends Object
This class creates and manages a receipt
Version:
1.0
Author:

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Receipt()
    create an empty receipt by initializing date, time, total, order list, amount, receiptsPath, titlePath, receipt Text and upload the title.
